short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This uses Gpt3 to complete 2 flows. Ask questions then rewrite prompt and provide feedback then grade.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The goal of this application is to provide a place for users of services like ChatGPT or Dalle to improve the quality of their prompts. These types of services are only as good as what is being asked of them hence why I think it is essential to find ways to improve how we interact with these services. This is achieved using 2 flows:  asking questions then rewriting the prompt and providing feedback then grade.
